mapper.select: select * from member order by mem_idx
select * from member where mem_idx=#{ mem_idx }
select * from member where mem_id=#{ mem_id }
mapper.insert: insert into member values( seq_member_idx.nextVal, #{ mem_name }, #{ mem_id }, #{ mem_pwd }, #{ mem_zipcode }, #{ mem_addr }, #{ mem_ip }, sysdate, default )
mapper.delete: delete from member where mem_idx=#{ mem_idx }
mapper.update: update member set mem_name= #{ mem_name }, mem_pwd= #{ mem_pwd }, mem_zipcode= #{ mem_zipcode }, mem_addr= #{ mem_addr }, mem_ip= #{ mem_ip }, mem_grade= #{ mem_grade } where mem_idx= #{ mem_idx }
